fullText: Sam Rockwell and Nina Arianda bring a ferocious sexual heat to their performances as the doomed lovers in Sam Shepard's 'Fool for Love,' but even their blazing chemistry can't ignite this oddly passionless revival.
dtliExcerpt: Sam Rockwell and Nina Arianda bring a ferocious sexual heat to their performances as the doomed lovers in Sam Shepard's 'Fool for Love,' but even their blazing chemistry can't ignite this oddly passionless revival.
